rows.text: @global.app_name is an app designed by IDEMS International and Parenting for Lifelong Health to support the scale up of Crianza con Conciencia + in Mexico. Illustrations are adaptations of original work by Orli Setton, created by Nicole Colixto for Parenting for Lifelong Health. The content herein is shared under a CC BY-SA 4.0 International licence. It was developed in collaboration with key partners:

text.eng: @global.app_name is an app designed by IDEMS International and Parenting for Lifelong Health to support the scale up of Crianza con Conciencia + in Mexico.
